text: Al-Kashf wa-l-bayān ʿan tafsīr al-Qurʾān (), also known as the Tafsir al- Thalabi, is a classical Sunni tafsir, or commentary on the Quran, by eleventh- century Islamic scholar Ahmad ibn Muhammad al-Thalabi. It is composed of 10 volumes and it is over 3,425 pages. ==Editions== * (single-volume edition) * (10-volume edition) * ==See also== *List of Sunni books Category:Sunni tafsir
title: Tafsir al-Thalabi
